Title: Establishes a presumption of shared parenting of minor children in matrimonial and family court proceedings
Summary: Establishes a presumption of shared parenting of minor children in matrimonial and family court proceedings.
LawCode: Amd §§70 & 240, add §240-d, Dom Rel L; add §§654 & 654-a, Fam Ct Act
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the domestic relations law and the family court act, in relation to establishing a presumption of shared parenting of minor children in matrimonial and family court proceedings
